columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp when the log entry was generated.

columns.name: InsertId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the log entry used to prevent duplication.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: The severity level of the log entry (e.g., INFO, WARNING, ERROR).

columns.name: ReceiveTimestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the log entry was received.

columns.name: JsonPayloadType
columns.description: The type identifier from the JSON payload '@type' field.

columns.name: LogName
columns.description: The full name of the log entry indicating its origin and log type within the GCP project.

columns.name: ResourceType
columns.description: A string indicating the type of the monitored GCP resource that generated the log entry

columns.name: JsonPayloadAccesses
columns.description: Access details extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadEventId
columns.description: The event identifier from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadLocationPrincipalEmployingEntity
columns.description: Principal employing entity location extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadLocationPrincipalOfficeCountry
columns.description: Principal office country location extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadLocationPrincipalPhysicalLocationCountry
columns.description: Principal physical location country extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadLogMode
columns.description: Log mode value extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadPrincipalJobTitle
columns.description: Principal job title extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadProduct
columns.description: Product name extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: JsonPayloadReason
columns.description: Reason or cause extracted from the JSON payload.

columns.name: OperationId
columns.description: The identifier of the operation from the operation JSON object.

columns.name: ResourceLabelsProjectId
columns.description: Project ID label extracted from the resource JSON object.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the log entry was generated.
